name: The Pantry
description: A locally loved, independently owned restaurant and café in the heart of Newmarket. Open from breakfast through dinner, The Pantry offers fresh, seasonal dishes, creative cocktails, and themed evenings in a warm and welcoming space. Perfect for post-race dining, family meals, and relaxed nights out.

address.streetAddress: The Guineas Shopping Centre, 74 The Rookery

keywords: places to eat near Newmarket Races

hasMenuItem.name: Duck (Special)
hasMenuItem.description: Slow-cooked duck with tender meat that slips off the bone, beautifully presented with seasonal vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Soft Shell Crab Taco
hasMenuItem.description: Served with guacamole, jalapeño salsa, sour cream and a summer twist.

hasMenuItem.name: Lamb Flatbread
hasMenuItem.description: A Mediterranean-style dish featuring tender lamb, salad and zesty dressing on a warm flatbread.

hasMenuItem.name: Club Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A local favourite — stacked layers of grilled chicken, crispy bacon, lettuce and tomato.

hasMenuItem.name: Picnic Board (To Share)
hasMenuItem.description: A curated selection of savoury bites perfect for sharing, including meats, cheese and dips.

hasMenuItem.name: Hugo Spritz
hasMenuItem.description: A refreshing elderflower and prosecco cocktail, perfect for sunny afternoons on the terrace.

event.name: Pudding Night
event.description: Starter, main course, and six delicious desserts prepared by in-house baker Joao — all for just £29.

event.name: Burger Night
event.description: Every Wednesday — enjoy two delicious courses and a side for just £20 per person.

event.name: Tapas Night
event.description: Every Friday — enjoy delicious small plates to share, paired with wine and cocktails.

event.name: Kids Eat Free (Summer Offer)
event.description: This summer, kids eat free at The Pantry! One child gets two courses free per adult main meal or lunch sandwich. Just mention 'Kids Eat Free'.

review.reviewBody: The duck was so tender and slipped right off the bone. The soft crab taco was delicious, and the presentation was incredible. Leia was fantastic as always!
We come here weekly. The food is always excellent, the service is friendly, and Holly is always so great. The club sandwich is our top pick.
Fantastic breakfast with top-notch service from Liam. Lovely, welcoming family atmosphere.

award: Endorsed by Two Michelin Star Chef Daniel Clifford: 'They cook everything fresh with local ingredients and the menu selection is interesting. Best for Breakfast.'

additionalProperty.name: Catering Services
additionalProperty.value: Available for private events, dinner parties, garden gatherings, or work functions. Includes full-service setup, serving, and clean-up.

additionalProperty.name: Private Hire
additionalProperty.value: The venue is available for private hire — perfect for birthdays, celebrations, corporate functions and more.

subjectOf.name: Where to eat after Newmarket Races
subjectOf.description: The Pantry is a popular dining choice for racegoers looking for relaxed post-race meals and drinks near the course.

subjectOf.name: Best dog-friendly restaurants in Suffolk
subjectOf.description: With outdoor seating and a welcoming attitude to four-legged friends, The Pantry is perfect for dog owners visiting Newmarket.

subjectOf.name: Where to eat out in Newmarket at night
subjectOf.description: With themed evenings, cocktails and seasonal specials, The Pantry offers a fresh alternative for evening dining in Newmarket.
